list.what is it?: Started as a website update + refresh. I adapted many existing static sections into ACF Blocks in addition to building completely new ones. I now provide ongoing maintenance and support.
list.tech: Custom WordPress theme (PHP) using Advanced Custom Fields.
list.workflow: Local by Flywheel, WP Engine, GitHub.
list.notes: Although this engagement took place during my time within an agency, I was the sole developer on the refresh and have continued to support them as a freelancer.
